References

Collaboration,
CDF
Collaboration,
CMS
Collaboration, and D0 Collaboration, " First combination
of Tevatron and LHC measurements of the top-quark mass, "
http://arxiv.org/abs/1403.4427.

pp. 1285–1292, 1970.

quark in the standard and two-Higgs-doublet models, " Physical

cH decay width in the standard model, " Physics Letters B, vol.
